entry.title: Anywhere and Everywhere
entry.summary:
Author: Thewriting_hub

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,930Chapters: 19/35Kudos: 622

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere. Sometimes it comforted you knowing you would never truly be without him but sometimes it was very inconvenient. Like tonight, Scarecrow was planning on a mass release of his newest fear toxin, not to mention he was working with someone new on the Gotham crime scene but they seemed so very familiar.

entry.title: delayed satisfaction is the sweetest
entry.summary:
Author: dreamtiming

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,614Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 19

Summary: “That’s why you keep asking to go on patrol with me, right? My cutting intellect?” He asks, dipping a fry from his takeout box in a pool of ketchup. You wonder if the splotch on his sleeve is from a rather exuberant dip, or if it’s blood from earlier. “Among other things.” You say, feeling like it’s finally your turn to offer someone an ambiguous response. Especially as he returns to this topic of conversation he is so insistent on having out with you. For emphasis, you take a great bite of your food to allot you more time to muster defenses. “What other things?” Jason presses, because it might work with someone else—but not him, who, with no protection of the mask to guide his face, bores his eyes into you. “Like the fact that you paid for the food.” You offer gleefully, both of you knowing this is unsatisfactory. “Can’t be the only thing.” He says, his tone surprisingly level. Why on earth is your heart beating so fast? tl;dr: stuck in the middle with you. Dick Grayson/Reader/Jason Todd

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 790,882Chapters: 100/?Kudos: 819

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I’ve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: Outsiders Inspired Batboys: Jason Todd x Chubby! Reader x Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,972Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two endings depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,474Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 64

Summary: They were brought to this world for whatever reason, and they yearn for nothing more than a way back to the warm confines of their home.Unfortunately, it won't be so easy to get back. And whoever decides to get involved won't make it any easier.
